name: The Fish's Tale
description:
*WARNING - This game contains a fair amount of reading / dialog.*

After inheriting the possessions of her late father, Monica finds herself in dire need of assistance.

To her he has left three things:

His house, a meager sum of money, and a responsibility.

A responsibility that she soon found herself unable to handle alone.

So, after enlisting the help of a hired hand for the night, the pair must work together to achieve their goal.

Will they manage to accomplish their task in time?

Or will it finally awaken?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

* Note, time does not pass during character dialog. There's no need to rush.  ;)

** Also note, this game was made for Windows and will not function on other systems or devices!

*** Final note, this game is 64-bit, and will not run on a 32-bit system!
